title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-ui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat history, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint proxy.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI wrapper around ollama with chat sessions, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside buffers, generate code, or refactor selections.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list models with fluent builders and Spring-Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama HTTP API—chat, embeddings, and model management idiomatically.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer behaviour, streaming chat, and LiveView hooks.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, embeddings, and tool calling; includes Aspire sample.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify.ai integration that lets you plug any Ollama model into Dify’s no-code LLM app builder.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for production pipelines.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Official example repo showing how to use Ollama’s embedding models for local RAG with LangChain.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) with compose examples for production deployments.

title: ollama-hub
summary: Community registry of custom Modelfiles, quantized GGUFs, and prompt packs for niche use-cases.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama chat and image-to-text models in any Discord server.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama, supports multiple models and session memory.
